links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A011757(n) modulo A000040(n). - _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013
maple: seq(ithprime(i^2) mod ithprime(i), i=1..1000); # _Robert Israel_, May 26 2014
prog: (PARI) a(n) = prime(n^2) % prime(n); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 30 2013(MAGMA) [NthPrime(n^2) mod NthPrime(n): n in [1..90]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 09 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
